content:
Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 33, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 6, "index": 23}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 48, "index": 35}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 7, "index": 37}]
thought: I need to craft polished_blackstone_wall. The recipe requires 6 polished_blackstone, so I need to move 1 polished_blackstone from slot 23 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I have moved 1 polished_blackstone into slot 1, and need to move another one into slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1
